span.span: The namespace provides a wide variety of members that support COM interop and platform invoke services.

summary.span: 如果您不熟悉這些服務，請參閱與 Unmanaged 程式碼互通。

span.span: If you are unfamiliar with these services, see Interoperating with Unmanaged Code.
